name: Twist (itch) (HealliesGames)
description:
Promotional page for Twist.
My attempt on the hyper-casual genre. I didn't think the title "Twist" was so common. Nor how effectively the mechanics of stacking were so used.

However it doesn't surprise me: the hyper-casual games market is very large, and finding similar ideas between them is easy.

It was a good experiment anyway, I hope you find it a great pastime!

The game is available on Google Play.
